result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: Bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.eng: They ran into me on the road.
result.ga: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.orig: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhóthar
result.html: Bhuail siad umam ar an bhótharThey ran into me on the road.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuail siad umam ar an ḃóṫarThey ran into me on the road.

result.eng: His sons were around him.
result.ga: Bhí a mhacra uime
result.orig: Bhí a mhacra uime
result.html: Bhí a mhacra uimeHis sons were around him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ṁacra uimeHis sons were around him.

result.eng: There was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ga: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.orig: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnóna
result.html: Bhí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aghaidh go dtí an teach tábhairne um thráthnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí cruiniú ar siúl ar maidin agus lean muid ar aġaiḋ go dtí an teaċ táḃairne um ṫráṫnónaThere was a meeting in the morning and we continued to the pub in the evening.

result.eng: They were still working at this time last year.
result.ga: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.orig: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caite
result.html: Bhí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an bhliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fós i mbun oibre um an dtaca seo an ḃliain seo caiteThey were still working at this time last year.

result.eng: He was wearning a prisoner's uniform.
result.ga: Bhí éide an phríosúnaigh uime
result.orig: Bhí éide an phríosúnaigh uime
result.html: Bhí éide an phríosúnaigh uimeHe was wearning a prisoner's uniform.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí éide an ṗríosúnaiġ uimeHe was wearning a prisoner's uniform.

result.eng: Why did you do that?
result.ga: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.orig: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sin
result.html: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?
result.ponchtml: Cad uime a ndearna tú é sinWhy did you do that?

result.eng: She heard his voice around noon.
result.ga: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.orig: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóin
result.html: Chuala sí a ghuth um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí a ġuṫ um nóinShe heard his voice around noon.

result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: He visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ga: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuir sé cuairt ar a chlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé cuairt ar a ċlann iad go léir pósta um an dtaca sinHe visited his children, all of them married by that time.

result.eng: He put on his work clothes.
result.ga: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.orig: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibre
result.html: Chuir sé uime a chulaith oibreHe put on his work clothes.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé uime a ċulaiṫ oibreHe put on his work clothes.

result.eng: They organized a republican commemoration around Easter.
result.ga: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um Cháisc
result.orig: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um Cháisc
result.html: D'eagraigh siad comóradh poblachtach um CháiscThey organized a republican commemoration around Easter.
result.ponchtml: D'eagraiġ siad comóraḋ poblaċtaċ um ĊáiscThey organized a republican commemoration around Easter.

result.eng: He returned to Ireland around Christmas.
result.ga: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um Nollaig
result.orig: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um Nollaig
result.html: D'fhill sé ar Éirinn um NollaigHe returned to Ireland around Christmas.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟill sé ar Éirinn um NollaigHe returned to Ireland around Christmas.

result.eng: I am tightening the rescue vest around me.
result.ga: Fáiscim umam an veist tharrthála
result.orig: Fáiscim umam an veist tharrthála
result.html: Fáiscim umam an veist tharrthálaI am tightening the rescue vest around me.
result.ponchtml: Fáiscim umam an veist ṫarrṫálaI am tightening the rescue vest around me.

result.eng: I begged him for mercy.
result.ga: Ghuigh mé é um thrócaire
result.orig: Ghuigh mé é um thrócaire
result.html: Ghuigh mé é um thrócaireI begged him for mercy.
result.ponchtml: Ġuiġ mé é um ṫrócaireI begged him for mercy.

result.eng: Applicants for asylum.
result.ga: Iarratasóirí um thearmann
result.orig: Iarratasóirí um thearmann
result.html: Iarratasóirí um thearmannApplicants for asylum.
result.ponchtml: Iarratasóirí um ṫearmannApplicants for asylum.

result.eng: It was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ga: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.orig: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnóna
result.html: Nochtadh i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Átha Cliath um thráthnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.
result.ponchtml: Noċtaḋ i mBéal Feirste ar maidin é agus arís i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ um ṫráṫnónaIt was revealed in Belfast in the morning and again in Dublin in the evening.

result.eng: Sit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ga: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.orig: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhála
result.html: Suigh sa charr agus tarraing umat an crios sábhálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ sa ċarr agus tarraing umat an crios sáḃálaSit in the car and put the safety belt around yourself.

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ga: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.orig: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidin
result.html: Tháinig an post isteach um 7 45 gach maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig an post isteaċ um 7 45 gaċ maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.eng: This is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ga: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.orig: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin é
result.html: Uime sin dhíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
result.ponchtml: Uime sin ḋíbir an Tiarna as gairdín Éidin éThis is why the Lord expelled him from the garden of Eden.
